PROVIDER.NAME: Coface Poland Services Sp. z o.o.

COMPANY.COPYRIGHT: Coface Poland Services Sp. z o.o.
COMPANY.HISTORY: The subject was established in 1947 as a state owned company. In 1991 the company was transformed to a joint stock company. On 01.10.2008 the company took over the company Hydrobudowa Grunt-Bud sp. z o.o..

INDICATOR.TYPE: Called up share capital (issued capital stock)

AUTHORITY.AUTHORITYTYPE: If more more than one managing director is nominated, the directive determines their authorization to represent the firm. The representation of the firm by a managing director together with a signing clerk is possible.

If one managing director is nominated, the firm is represented by board member independently. If more than one board member is nominated, the firm is represented jointly by two board members or by one of them along with a proxy.
